description:
As a user
  I want to use a button
  So that I can open and close the calendar

steps.name: the user clicks the calendar button

the user clicks the calendar button

the user clicks the calendar button

the user clicks the calendar button

name: Cell Navigation

description:
As a user
  I want to select a cell
  So that I pick a date

elements.name: Select a cell: minimum view: day

steps.name: the calendar is open on the minimum view: "day"
the user clicks on the tabbable cell
the date is submitted with a value of "15 Mar 2020"

elements.name: Select a cell: minimum view: month

steps.name: the calendar is open on the minimum view: "month"
the user clicks on the tabbable cell
the date is submitted with a value of "01 Mar 2020"

elements.name: Select a cell: minimum view: year

steps.name: the calendar is open on the minimum view: "year"
the user clicks on the tabbable cell
the date is submitted with a value of "01 Jan 2020"

elements.name: Select a cell: higher than minimum view: year

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "year" view
the user clicks on the tabbable cell

elements.name: Select a cell: higher than minimum view: month

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "month" view
the user clicks on the tabbable cell

elements.name: Select and deselect a cell when inline>

steps.name: the user clicks on the tabbable cell
the user clicks on the tabbable cell

name: Cell Selection

description:
As a user
  I want to use a button
  So that I can clear the date

elements.name: Click on clear button: closed

steps.name: the calendar is "closed" and a date is selected
the user clicks on the clear button

elements.name: Click on clear button: open

steps.name: the calendar is "open" and a date is selected
the user clicks on the clear button

elements.name: Click on clear button: typeable: closed

steps.name: the typeable calendar is "closed" and a date is selected
the user clicks on the clear button

elements.name: Click on clear button: typeable: open

steps.name: the typeable calendar is "open" and a date is selected
the user clicks on the clear button

name: Clear Button

description:
As a user
  I want to press the delete or backspace key
  So that I can clear the date

elements.name: Clear date via "backspace"

steps.name: the calendar has a selected date
the user focuses the input field and presses "backspace"

elements.name: Clear date via "del"

steps.name: the calendar has a selected date
the user focuses the input field and presses "del"

elements.name: Clear inline date via "backspace"

steps.name: the inline calendar has a selected date
the user focuses any element and presses "backspace"

elements.name: Clear inline date via "del"

steps.name: the inline calendar has a selected date
the user focuses any element and presses "del"

name: Clear date on delete

description:
As a user
  I want to press the escape key
  So that I can revert to today's date or close the calendar

elements.name: Close by pressing escape on the open-date

steps.name: the user focuses the "open-date" and presses escape

elements.name: Close by pressing escape on the previous-button

steps.name: the user focuses the "previous-button" and presses escape

elements.name: Close by pressing escape on the up-button

steps.name: the user focuses the "up-button" and presses escape

elements.name: Close by pressing escape on the next-button

steps.name: the user focuses the "next-button" and presses escape

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on the same page: day

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "day" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "day" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on the same page: month

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "month" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "month" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on the same page: year

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "year" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "year" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on a different page: day

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "day" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "day" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on a different page: month

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "month" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "month" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on a different page: year

steps.name: the calendar is open on a "year" view
the user focuses another cell on the same "year" view and presses the escape key

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on a different view: month

steps.name: the calendar is open with a "month" initial view
the user focuses a cell and presses the escape key
the open date on the minimum view has focus

elements.name: Revert to open date when the focused cell is on a different view: year

steps.name: the calendar is open with a "year" initial view
the user focuses a cell and presses the escape key
the open date on the minimum view has focus

name: Close on escape
